anya-e0803n13:3_0: Yā hi sā heṭṭhā amhehi eka dviti catuiccetesaṁ saṅkhyāsabbanāmānaṁ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n13:3_1: kathitā, taṁ ṭhapetvā idha asabbanāmānaṁ pañca cha sattādīnaṁ saṅkhyānāmānaṁ nāmikapadamālā
anya-e0803n13:3_2: bhūdhātumayehi aññehi ca rūpehi yojanatthaṁ vuccate –
anya-e0803n13:4_0: Pañca, pañcahi, pañcabhi, pañcannaṁ, pañcasu. Sattannaṁ vibhattīnaṁ vasena ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:4_1: ‘‘Pañca bhūtā, pañca abhibhavitāro, pañca purisā, pañca bhūmiyo, pañca kaññāyo, pañca
anya-e0803n13:4_2: bhūtāni, pañca cittānī’’tiādinā sabbattha yojetabbaṁ. Cha, chahi, chabhi, channaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:4_3: chasu, chassu itipi. ‘‘Chassu loko samuppanno, chassu krubbati santhava’’nti hi pāḷi.
anya-e0803n13:4_4: Satta, sattahi, sattabhi, sattannaṁ, sattasu. Aṭṭha, aṭṭhahi, aṭṭhabhi, aṭṭhannaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:4_5: aṭṭhasu. Nava, navahi, navabhi, navannaṁ, navasu. Dasa, dasahi, dasabhi, dasannaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:4_6: dasasu. Evaṁ ekādasa. Dvādasa, bārasa. Terasa, tedasa, teḷasa. Catuddasa, cuddasa.
anya-e0803n13:4_7: Pañcadasa, pannarasa. Soḷasa. Sattarasa. Aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhārasahi, aṭṭhārasabhi, aṭṭhārasannaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:5_0: Ekūnavīsati, ekūnavīsaṁ iccādipi. Ekūnavīsāya, ekūnavīsāyaṁ, ekūnavīsa bhikkhū tiṭṭhanti,
anya-e0803n13:5_1: ekūnavīsaṁ bhikkhū passati, evaṁ ‘‘kaññāyo cittānī’’ti ca ādinā yojetabbaṁ. Ekūnavīsāya
anya-e0803n13:5_2: bhikkhūhi dhammo desito, ekūnavīsāya kaññāhi kataṁ, ekūnavīsāya cittehi kataṁ, ekūnavīsāya
anya-e0803n13:5_3: bhikkhūnaṁ cīvaraṁ deti, ekūnavīsāya kaññānaṁ dhanaṁ deti, ekūnavīsāya cittānaṁ ruccati,
anya-e0803n13:5_4: ekūnavīsāya bhikkhūhi apeti . Evaṁ kaññāhi cittehi. Ekūnavīsāya bhikkhūnaṁ santakaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:5_5: evaṁ kaññānaṁ cittānaṁ. Ekūnavīsāyaṁ bhikkhūsu patiṭṭhitaṁ. Evaṁ ‘‘kaññāsu cittesū’’ti
anya-e0803n13:6_0: Vīsati, vīsatiṁ, vīsatiyā, vīsatiyaṁ. Vīsa, vīsaṁ, vīsāya, vīsāyaṁ. Tathā ekavīsa
anya-e0803n13:6_1: dvāvīsa bāvīsa tevīsa catuvīsa iccādīsupi. Tiṁsa, tiṁsaṁ, tiṁsāya, tiṁsāyaṁ. Cattālīsa,
anya-e0803n13:6_2: cattālīsaṁ, cattālīsāya, cattālīsāyaṁ. Cattārīsa iccādipi. Paññāsa, paññāsaṁ, paññāsāya,
anya-e0803n13:6_3: paññāsāyaṁ. Paṇṇāsa, paṇṇāsaṁ, paṇṇāsāya, paṇṇāsāyaṁ. Saṭṭhi, saṭṭhiṁ, saṭṭhiyā,
anya-e0803n13:6_4: saṭṭhiyaṁ. Sattati, sattatiṁ, sattatiyā, sattatiyaṁ. Sattari iccādipi. Asīti, asītiṁ,
anya-e0803n13:6_5: asītiyā, asītiyaṁ. Navuti. Navutiṁ, navutiyā, navutiyaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:7_0: Itthañca aññathāpi saṅkhyārūpāni gahetabbāni. Ekūnavīsehi, ekūnavīsānaṁ, ekūnavīsesu.
anya-e0803n13:7_1: ‘‘Channavutīna’’nti ca ādināpi saṅkhyārūpānaṁ katthaci dassanato keci saddasatthavidū
anya-e0803n13:7_3: ānavuti ekavacanantā itthiliṅgā’’ti vadanti. Keci panāhu –
anya-e0803n13:10_0: Ettha dvivacanaṁ chaḍḍetabbaṁ buddhavacane tadabhāvato. Sabbesampi ca tesaṁ yathāvuttavacanaṁ
anya-e0803n13:10_1: kiñci pāḷippadesaṁ patvā yujjati, kiñci pana patvā na yujjati vīsativīsaṁtiṁsaṁiccādīnañhi
anya-e0803n13:10_2: saṅkhatthānaṁ saddānaṁ bahuvacanappayogavasenapi pāḷiyaṁ dassanato , kaccāyane ca
anya-e0803n13:11_0: Atthinatthisaddā hi nipātattā ekattepi bahuttepi pavattanti ‘‘puttā matthi dhanammatthi.
anya-e0803n13:11_1: Natthi attasamaṁ pemaṁ. Natthi samaṇabrāhmaṇā’’tiādīsu. Aliṅgattepi panetesaṁ katthaci
anya-e0803n13:11_2: itthiliṅgabhāvo diṭṭho. Abhidhamme hi dhammasenāpatinā anudhammacakkavattinā vohārakusalena
anya-e0803n13:11_3: vohārakusalasādhakena ‘‘atthiyā nava. Natthiyā navā’’ti ekavacanantaṁ itthiliṅgarūpaṁ
anya-e0803n13:11_4: dassitaṁ, tasmā vīsativīsatimiccādīnampi yathāsambhavaṁ yathāpāvacanañca itthiliṅgabhāve
anya-e0803n13:12_0: Tattheke ‘‘hetuyā adhipatiyā’’ti ca idaṁ liṅgavipallāsavasena gahetabbaṁ maññanti.
anya-e0803n13:12_2: adhipatipaccaye’’ iccevattho. Atha vā ‘‘hetuyā adhipatiyā’’ti dvayamidaṁ itthiliṅgarūpapaṭibhāgaṁ
anya-e0803n13:12_4: pulliṅgarūpānampi vijjamānattā, ‘‘atthiyā natthiyā’’ti idaṁ pana liṅgavipallāsavasena
anya-e0803n13:12_5: vuttanti na gahetabbaṁ atthi natthisaddānaṁ aliṅgabhedattā. Na hi atthi natthisaddā
anya-e0803n13:12_6: tīsu liṅgesu ekasmimpi antogadhā. Etesu hi atthisaddo ākhyātanipātavasena bhijjati
anya-e0803n13:12_7: ‘‘atthi santi saṁvijjati. Atthikhīrā brāhmaṇī’’tiādīsu , natthisaddo pana nipātoyeva.
anya-e0803n13:12_8: Iccevaṁ atthi natthisaddānaṁ nipātānañca liṅgavacanavasena kathanaṁ yujjati itthiliṅgādivasena
anya-e0803n13:14: Vacanesu ca sabbesu, yaṁ na byeti tadabyaya’’nti.
anya-e0803n13:15_0: Ettha siyā – nanu ca bho ‘‘atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā’’ti vacanato atthisaddo
anya-e0803n13:15_1: paṭhamāya vibhattiyā yutto, evaṁ sante kasmā ‘‘sadisaṁ tīsu liṅgesū’’tiādi vuttanti?
anya-e0803n13:15_2: Saccaṁ atthisaddo paṭhamāya vibhattiyā yutto, tathā natthisaddo atthisaddassa vacanalesena
anya-e0803n13:15_3: gahetabbattā yugaḷapadattā ca. Idaṁ pana ‘‘sadisaṁ tīsu liṅgesū’’tiādivacanaṁ upasagganipātasaṅkhāte
anya-e0803n13:15_4: asaṅkhyāsadde sandhāya vuttaṁ, na ekekamasaṅkhyāsaddaṁ sandhāya. Tathā hi ‘‘asaṅkhyā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:15_5: ca ‘‘abyayā’’ti ca laddhavohāresu upasagganipātesu upasaggā sabbepi sabbavibhattivacanakā.
anya-e0803n13:15_6: Nipātānaṁ pana ekacce paṭhamādīsu yathārahaṁ vibhattiyuttā, ekacce avibhattiyuttā.
anya-e0803n13:15_7: Tattha ye yadaggena vibhattiyuttā, te tadaggena tabbacanakā. Upasagganipātesu hi
anya-e0803n13:15_8: paccekaṁ ‘‘idaṁ nāma vacana’’nti laddhuṁ na sakkā, sabbasaṅgāhakavasena pana ‘‘sadisaṁ
anya-e0803n13:15_9: tīsu liṅgesū’’tiādi pubbācariyehi vuttaṁ. Kaccāyanācariyenapi imamevatthaṁ sandhāya
anya-e0803n13:15_10: ‘‘sabbāsamāvusopasagganipātādīhi cā’’ti vuttaṁ. Na hi āvusosaddato sabbāpi vibhattiyo
anya-e0803n13:15_11: labbhanti, atha kho ālapanatthavācakattā ekavacanikaanekavacanikā paṭhamāvibhattiyoyeva
anya-e0803n13:16_0: Keci pana sabbehipi nipātehi sabbavibhattilopaṁ vadanti, taṁ na gahetabbaṁ. ‘‘Atthi
anya-e0803n13:16_1: sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāya. Divā bhiyyo namo iccete paṭhamāya ca dutiyāya cā’’tiādivacanato,
anya-e0803n13:16_2: padapūraṇamattānañca avibhattiyuttānaṁ atha khalu vata vatha iccādīnaṁ nipātānaṁ
anya-e0803n13:16_3: vacanato. Etthāpi siyā ‘‘nanu ca bho avibhattiyuttānampi nipātānaṁ sambhavato atthi
anya-e0803n13:16_4: natthisaddānaṁ avibhattiko niddeso kātabbo, atha kimatthaṁ ‘atthiyā nava, natthiyā
anya-e0803n13:16_5: navā’ti savibhattiko niddeso kato’’ti? Sabbathā vibhattīhi vinā atthassa niddisitumasakkuṇeyyattāti.
anya-e0803n13:17_0: Yadi evaṁ ‘‘atthi sakkā labbhā iccete paṭhamāyā’’ti vacanato atthi natthisaddā luttāya
anya-e0803n13:17_1: paṭhamāya vibhattiyā vasena paṭhamāvibhattikāyeva niddisitabbā, evamakatvā kasmā
anya-e0803n13:17_2: sattamyantavasena ‘‘atthiyā natthiyā’’ti niddiṭṭhāti? Saccaṁ, atthi natthisaddā paṭhamāvibhattiyuttāyeva
anya-e0803n13:17_3: niddisitabbā, tathāpi ‘‘atthipaccaye nava, natthipaccaye navā’’ti etassatthassa paridīpane
anya-e0803n13:17_4: paṭhamāya okāso natthi, sattamiyāyeva pana atthi, tasmā ‘‘atthiyā nava, natthiyā
anya-e0803n13:17_5: navā’’ti vuttaṁ. Iti atthiyānatthiyāsaddānaṁ sattamyantabhāve siddheyeva tatiyācatutthīpañcamīchaṭṭhiyantabhāvopi
anya-e0803n13:17_6: siddhoyeva hoti. Tasmā ‘‘atthibhāvo atthitā’’tiādīsupi atthiyā bhāvo atthibhāvo,
anya-e0803n13:17_7: natthiyā bhāvo natthibhāvo, atthiyā bhāvo atthitābhiādinā samāsataddhitaviggaho avassamicchitabbo.
anya-e0803n13:17_8: Yadidamamhehi vuttaṁ, taṁ ‘‘pāḷiyā virujjhatī’’ti na vattabbaṁ pāḷinayānusārena vuttattāti.
anya-e0803n13:18_0: Evaṁ hotu, kasmā bho ‘‘atthiyā, natthiyā’’ti itthiliṅganiddeso kato, nanu nipātopasaggā
anya-e0803n13:18_1: aliṅgabhedāti? Saccaṁ, idaṁ pana ṭhānaṁ atīva sukhumaṁ, tathāpi pubbācariyānubhāvaññeva
anya-e0803n13:18_2: nissāya vinicchayaṁ brūma. Yathā hi vīsatiiccādīnaṁ saṅkhyāsaddānaṁ sarūpato adabbavācakattepi
anya-e0803n13:18_3: dabbavācakānaṁ latāmatirattiitthī yāguvadhūsaddānaṁ viya itthiliṅgabhāvo saddasatthavidūhi
anya-e0803n13:18_4: anumato, evaṁ adabbavācakattepi atthi natthisaddānaṁ katthaci itthiliṅgabhāvo saddhammavidūhi
anya-e0803n13:18_5: anumato. Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati ‘‘atthiyā nava, natthiyā navā’’ti. Atha vā
anya-e0803n13:18_7: gahetabbāni, na ettha codetabbaṁ, evarūpāni nipātapadāni pubbācariyehi vuttāni na
anya-e0803n13:19_0: Pāvacanasmiñhi garūhi aniddiṭṭhānipi anekavihitāni nipātapadāni sandissanti, nāpi
anya-e0803n13:19_1: ‘‘hetuyā, adhipatiyā, atthiyā, natthiyā’’ti evamādīsu ‘‘apasaddā ime’’ti virodho
anya-e0803n13:19_2: uppādetabbo. Na hi acinteyyānubhāvena pāramitāpuññena nipphannena anāvaraṇañāṇena
anya-e0803n13:19_3: sabbaṁ ñeyyamaṇḍalaṁ hatthatale āmalakaṁ viya paccakkhaṁ katvā passato buddhassa
anya-e0803n13:19_4: vacane aññesaṁ vācāvippalāpo avassaṁ labbhatīti. Nanu ca bho ‘‘hetuyā, adhipatiyā,
anya-e0803n13:19_5: atthiyā, natthiyā’’ti ca idaṁ sāriputtattheravacanaṁ tena nikkhittattā. Tathāgatena
anya-e0803n13:19_6: hi tāvatiṁsabhapane desitakāle imāni padāni na santi, evaṁ sante kasmā ‘‘buddhavacana’’nti
anya-e0803n13:19_7: vadathāti? Buddhavacanaṁyeva nāma. Āyasmato hi sāriputtassa tathāgatena nayo dinno,
anya-e0803n13:19_8: tenapi pabhinnapaṭisambhidena satthukappena aggasāvakena satthu santikā nayaṁ labhitvā
anya-e0803n13:19_9: byañjanaṁ suropitaṁ kataṁ. Sabbepi hi paṭisambhidappattā ariyā dunniruttiṁ na vadanti
anya-e0803n13:19_10: niruttipabhedasmiṁ sukusalattā, tasmā aññesamavisayo esa ariyānaṁ vohāroti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:21_0: Sataṁ, satāni, satā. Sataṁ, satāni, sate. Satena, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:21_1: Satā, satasmā, satamhā, satehi, satebhi. Satassa, satānaṁ. Sate, satasmiṁ, satamhi,
anya-e0803n13:21_2: satesu. Evaṁ sahassaṁ, sahassānīti yojetabbaṁ. Dasasahassaṁ satasahassaṁ dasasatasahassanti
anya-e0803n13:21_3: etthāpi eseva nayo. Ayaṁ panettha payogo ‘‘sataṁ bhikkhū, sataṁ itthiyo, sataṁ cittāni.
anya-e0803n13:21_4: Bhikkhūnaṁ sataṁ, itthīnaṁ sataṁ, cittānaṁ sataṁ. Sahassādīsupi eseva nayo. Itthañca
anya-e0803n13:21_5: aññathāpi saddarūpāni bhavanti. Koṭi, koṭī, koṭiyo. Rattinayena ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:23: Saṅkhyā tāva sā saṅkhyeyya-ppadhānāti garū vaduṁ.
anya-e0803n13:24: Vīsatito yāva satā, yā saṅkhyā tāva sā pana;
anya-e0803n13:27: Vīsato yāva koṭiyā, saṅkhyā tāva hi sā khalu;
anya-e0803n13:29: Tathā hi ‘‘asīti koṭiyo hitvā, hiraññassāpi pabbaji’’nti, ‘‘khīṇāsavā vītamalā, samiṁsu satakoṭiyo’’ti ca pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n13:30_0: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne sabbesaṁ saṅkhyāsaddarūpānaṁ pākaṭīkaraṇena viññūnaṁ sukhumañāṇapaṭilābhatthaṁ
anya-e0803n13:30_1: sāṭṭhakathaṁ udānapāḷippadesaṁ aññañca pāḷippadesamaṭṭhakathāvacanañca āharitvā dassayissāmi –
anya-e0803n13:31_0: ‘‘Yesaṁ kho visākhe sataṁ piyāni, sataṁ tesaṁ dukkhāni, yesaṁ navuti piyāni, navuti
anya-e0803n13:31_1: tesaṁ dukkhāni. Yesaṁ asīti…pe… yesaṁ sattati. Yesaṁ saṭṭhi. Yesaṁ paññāsaṁ, yesaṁ
anya-e0803n13:31_2: cattārīsaṁ, yesaṁ tiṁsaṁ. Yesaṁ kho visākhe vīsaṁ piyāni, vīsati tesaṁ dukkhāni.
anya-e0803n13:31_3: Yesaṁ dasa. Yesaṁ nava. Yesaṁ aṭṭha. Yesaṁ satta. Yesaṁ cha. Yesaṁ pañca. Yesaṁ cattāri.
anya-e0803n13:31_4: Yesaṁ tīṇi. Yesaṁ dve. Yesaṁ ekaṁ piyaṁ, tesaṁ ekaṁ dukkha’’nti.
anya-e0803n13:32_0: Tattha sataṁ piyānīti sataṁ piyāyitabbavatthūni. ‘‘Sataṁ piya’’ntipi keci paṭhanti.
anya-e0803n13:32_1: Ettha ca yasmā ekato paṭṭhāya yāva dasa, tāva saṅkhyāsaṅkhyeyyappadhānā, tasmā ‘‘yesaṁ
anya-e0803n13:32_2: dasa piyāni, dasa tesaṁ dukkhānī’’tiādinā pāḷi āgatā. Keci pana ‘‘yesaṁ dasa piyānaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:32_3: dasa tesaṁ dukkhāna’’ntiādinā paṭhanti, taṁ na sundaraṁ. Yasmā pana vīsatito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0803n13:32_4: yāva sataṁ, tāva saṅkhyeyyappadhānā saṅkhyāppadhānā ca, tasmā tatthāpi saṅkhyeyyappadhānaṁyeva
anya-e0803n13:32_5: gahetvā ‘‘yesaṁ kho visākhe sataṁ piyāni, sataṁ tesaṁ dukkhānī’’tiādinā pāḷi āgatā.
anya-e0803n13:32_6: Sabbesampi ca yesaṁ ekaṁ piyaṁ, ekaṁ tesaṁ dukkhanti pāṭho, na pana dukkhassāti.
anya-e0803n13:32_7: Ekasmiñhi padakkame ekarasāva bhagavato desanā hotīti. Tasmā yathāvuttanayāva pāḷi
anya-e0803n13:33: Idāni añño pāḷippadeso aṭṭhakathāpāṭhappadeso ca nīyate –
anya-e0803n13:37_0: Pāḷi. Ettha ‘‘sataṁ hatthī’’tiādīni visesitāni, ‘‘sahassānī’’ti visesanaṁ, tasmā
anya-e0803n13:37_1: sataṁsaddaṁ sahassasaddena yojetvā ‘‘hatthī’’tiādīni pana upapadaṁ katvā attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:37_2: Hatthī sataṁ sahassāni. Assā sataṁ sahassāni. Assatarīrathā sataṁ sahassāni. Āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā
anya-e0803n13:37_3: kaññā sataṁ sahassāni. Idaṁ saṅkhyeyyappadhānavasenatthagahaṇaṁ. Saṅkhyāppadhānavasena
anya-e0803n13:37_4: pana ayampi attho gahetabbo ‘‘hatthīnaṁ satasahassaṁ, assānaṁ satasahassaṁ, assatarīrathānaṁ
anya-e0803n13:37_5: satasahassaṁ, āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalānaṁ kaññānaṁ satasahassa’’nti. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi
anya-e0803n13:37_6: īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. ‘‘Yojanānaṁ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbato’’ti ayamaṭṭhakathāpāṭho.
anya-e0803n13:37_7: Ettha ‘‘pañcā’’ti saddaṁ satasaddena saddhiṁ yojetvā ‘‘sippikānaṁ sataṁ natthī’’ti
anya-e0803n13:37_8: ettha viya himavā pabbato yojanānaṁ pañca satāni uccoti saṅkhyāppadhānavasena attho
anya-e0803n13:37_9: gahetabbo. ‘‘Pañca satānī’’ti ca addhuno accantasaṁyogavasena upayogavacanaṁ. Ayaṁ
anya-e0803n13:37_10: nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. Satamiti saddo ‘‘sataṁ homi, sahassaṁ homī’’tiādīsu
anya-e0803n13:37_11: ekavacano. ‘‘Athetthekasataṁ khatyā, anuyantā yasassino’’tiādīsu bahuvacano. Evaṁ
anya-e0803n13:37_12: sahassādīnampi ekavacanabahuvacanatā labbhati. Tathā hi ‘‘bhiyyo naṁ satasahassaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:37_14: panassa puttā bhavissantī’’ti ettha sahassanti bahuvacananti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:40_0: Pāḷi. Ettha ‘‘kappe ca satasahasse caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti sāmiatthe upayogabahuvacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:40_1: tasmā ‘‘mahākappānaṁ satasahassānaṁ catunnaṁ asaṅkhiyānaṁ matthake’’ti attho gahetabbo,
anya-e0803n13:40_3: matthake’’iccevattho. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:42: Etthantare yaṁ caritaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ bodhipācana’’nti
anya-e0803n13:43_1: kappasaddasambandhena cāyaṁ pulliṅganiddeso upayoganiddeso ca. Samānādhikaraṇañhi
anya-e0803n13:43_2: idaṁ kappasaddena. ‘‘Caturo ca asaṅkhiye’’ti acchantasaṁyogavasena upayogabahuvacanāni.
anya-e0803n13:43_3: Kassa pana asaṅkhiyeti? Aññassa avuttattā kappassa ca vuttattā pakaraṇato ‘‘kappāna’’nti
anya-e0803n13:43_4: ayamattho viññāyateva. Na hi vuttaṁ vajjetvā avuttassa kassaci gahaṇaṁ yuttanti.
anya-e0803n13:43_5: Casaddo sampiṇḍanattho ‘‘mahākappānaṁ caturo asaṅkhyeyye satasahasse ca mahākappe’’ti.
anya-e0803n13:43_6: Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:44_0: ‘‘Ghaṭānekasahassāni, kumbhīnañca satā bahū’’ti pāḷi. Ettha ghaṭāti ghaṭānaṁ. Sāmiatthe
anya-e0803n13:44_1: hi idaṁ paccattavacanaṁ. ‘‘Ghaṭānaṁ anekasahassāni’’ iccevattho. Kumbhīnañca satā
anya-e0803n13:44_2: bahūti anekāni ca kumbhīnaṁ satāni. Ettha nikāralopo daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi
anya-e0803n13:47_0: Pāḷi. Ettha dasavīsasahassānanti dasasahassānaṁ vīsasahassānañca. Dhammābhisamayoti
anya-e0803n13:47_1: catusaccappaṭivedho. Ekadvinnanti sīsamattakathanaṁ, tena ‘‘ekassa ceva dvinnañca
anya-e0803n13:47_2: tiṇṇaṁ catunnaṁ…pe… dasanna’’ntiādinā nayena asaṅkhyeyyoti attho. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi
anya-e0803n13:50_0: Pāḷi. Ettha cattāri satasahassānīti idaṁ liṅgabhedavasena ‘‘chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:50_1: imehi dvīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇaṁ. Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyya vācakopi saddo
anya-e0803n13:50_2: napuṁsakova hoti, tasmā ‘‘cattāri satasahassānī’’ti ca ‘‘chaḷabhiññā’’ti ca ‘‘mahiddhikā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:50_3: ca etaṁ padattayaṁ samānādhikaraṇaṁ. Atha vā chaḷabhiññā mahiddhikāti chaḷabhiññānaṁ
anya-e0803n13:50_4: mahaddhikānanti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ. Imasmiṁ panatthe ‘‘cattāri
anya-e0803n13:50_5: satasahassānī’’ti ayaṁ saṅkhyāvacano bhavati. ‘‘Tīṇi satasahassāni, nāriyo samalaṅkatā’’tiādīsupi
anya-e0803n13:50_6: ayaṁ nayo netabbo. ‘‘Tā ca satta satā bhariyā, dāsyo satta satāni cā’’ti pāḷi. Ettha
anya-e0803n13:50_7: satāti ‘‘satānī’’ti napuṁsakavasena gahetabbaṁ, na itthiliṅgavasena. ‘‘Satā’’ti hi
anya-e0803n13:50_8: ‘‘pañca cittā vipākā’’tiādīni viya napuṁsakarūpaṁ. Itthiliṅgabhūtā hi satasaddo natthi,
anya-e0803n13:50_9: tathā pulliṅgabhūto. Yadi ca dviliṅgo satasaddo siyā , evañca sati ‘‘puriso, kaññā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:51_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘tā devatā sattasatā uḷārā’’ti ettha satasaddo itthiliṅgo hutvā dissatīti?
anya-e0803n13:51_1: Na, napuṁsakoyevāti. Nanu ca bho devatāsaddena samānādhikaraṇoti? Saccaṁ samānādhikaraṇo,
anya-e0803n13:51_2: tathāpi napuṁsakoyeva. Īdisesu hi saṅkhyāvisayesu samānādhikaraṇabhāvo appamāṇo.
anya-e0803n13:51_3: Tathā hi ‘‘pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciravāsino ahesu’’nti
anya-e0803n13:51_4: napuṁsakaliṅgena pulliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā dissati, tasmā ‘‘tā devatā sattasatā
anya-e0803n13:51_6: datvā’’tiādīsupi satasaddo napuṁsakoyeva. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:52_2: attho gahetabbo. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:53_2: so vasī’’ti pāḷiyampi. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:54_0: ‘‘Ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji nāyako’’ti pāḷi, ‘‘ekanavute ito kappe’’ti pāḷi
anya-e0803n13:54_1: ca. Ettha satasahassamhi kappeti satasahassānaṁ kappānaṁ matthake. Ekanavute kappeti
anya-e0803n13:54_2: ekanavutiyā kappānaṁ matthaketi bhummavacanassa sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:54_3: Tathā hi ‘‘bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatī’’ti ettha bhummavacanassa ‘‘bhagavato
anya-e0803n13:54_4: santike’’ti sāmibhummavacanavasena attho gahito. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:56: Nevamhākaṁ bhayaṁ koci, vane vāḷesu vijjatī’’ti
anya-e0803n13:57_0: Pāḷi. Ayametassā attho – tattha vane vāḷānaṁ sahassāni ca satāni ca nahutāni ca yadi
anya-e0803n13:57_1: vijjanti. Atha vā sahassāni satānīti satasahassāni, vāḷānaṁ satasahassāni ca nahutāni
anya-e0803n13:57_2: ca yadi vijjanti, evaṁ vijjantesupi vāḷesu kocīti kvaci. Kocisaddo hi ‘‘ko te balaṁ
anya-e0803n13:57_3: mahārājā’’ti ettha kosaddo viya kvasaddatthe vattati, nimittatthe cāyaṁ niddeso.
anya-e0803n13:57_4: Tena ‘‘koci kvaci kismiñci vāḷe ekassapi vāḷamigassa kāraṇā nevamhākaṁ bhayaṁ vijjatī’’ti
anya-e0803n13:57_5: attho gahetabbo. Atha vā kocīti kiñci appamattakampi. Ettha pana ‘‘vāḷesū’’ti nimittatthe
anya-e0803n13:57_6: bhummaṁ. Vāḷānaṁ kāraṇā appamattakampi amhākaṁ bhayaṁ na vijjatīti. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi
anya-e0803n13:60_0: Aṭṭhakathāpāṭho . Ettha yasmā saddato samānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṁ padānaṁ asamānavibhattiliṅgavacanānaṁ
anya-e0803n13:60_1: vā atthato pana samānānaṁ dūre ṭhitānampi ekasambandho hoti, itaresaṁ samīpe ṭhitānampi
anya-e0803n13:60_3: idaṁ pana ‘‘satasahassānī’’timinā sambandhitabbaṁ. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:63_2: cā’’ti imāni ‘‘duve cattārī’’ti imehi visesitabbattā ‘‘dvisatasahassaṁ catunahuta’’nti
anya-e0803n13:63_4: saṅkhyāsaddehi samānādhikaraṇatā pubbācariyehi na vuttā. Yasmā pana yathā ‘‘duve
anya-e0803n13:63_5: puthujjanā vuttā. Satasahassaṁ bhikkhū’’tiādīsu samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati dabbavācakattā
anya-e0803n13:63_6: visesitabbapadānaṁ, na tathā ‘‘duve satasahassānī’’tiādīsu adabbavācakattā visesitabbapadānaṁ,
anya-e0803n13:63_7: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā yuttiyā abhāvato. Yadi evaṁ
anya-e0803n13:63_8: ‘‘kusalā, rūpaṁ, cakkhumā’’tiādīnaṁ viya imesamaññamaññasambandharahitā siyāti? Na,
anya-e0803n13:63_10: Na, niyamābhāvato. Ekantena hi guṇaguṇīnaṁyeva visesanavisesitabbānaṁ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo,
anya-e0803n13:64_0: Tattha ‘‘ettaka’’nti pamāṇavacanaṁ. ‘‘Bahalattenā’’ti visesane tatiyā. Ubhayena imamatthaṁ
anya-e0803n13:64_1: dasseti ‘‘ayaṁ vasundharā bahalattena yojanānaṁ duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni
anya-e0803n13:64_2: ca ettakaṁ saṅkhātā’’ti. ‘‘Ettaka’’nti padassa ca ‘‘duve satasahassāni cattāri nahutāni
anya-e0803n13:64_3: cā’’ti imehi vā ‘‘vasundharā’’ti iminā vā samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā. Ettakanti
anya-e0803n13:64_4: hi bhāvanapuṁsakaṁ, yaṁ saddasatthe kriyāvisesananti vadanti. Tassa ‘‘ettakena pamāṇena’’iccevattho.
anya-e0803n13:64_5: Apica ‘‘duve satasahassāni cattāri na hutāni cā’’ti imesampi ‘‘vasundharā’’ti iminā
anya-e0803n13:64_6: samānādhikaraṇatā na icchitabbā ‘‘bhikkhūnaṁ sata’’nti ettha satasaddassa viya saṅkhyāvacanamattattā.
anya-e0803n13:64_7: Tathā hi ‘‘ettaka’’nti vuttaṁ. ‘‘Saṅkhātā’’ti pana ‘‘aya’’nti ca imesaṁ ‘‘vasundharā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:64_8: iminā samānādhikaraṇatā labbhati. Sabbopāyaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:66: Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā tā catuddasā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:67: Pāḷi. Ettha cha piṅgalā pannarasāti cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalā rājiyoti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n13:70: Asīti dasa eko ca, indanāmā mahabbalā’’ti
anya-e0803n13:71: Pāḷi . Ettha pana ‘‘ekanavutī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘asīti dasa eko cā’’ti vuttaṁ. Vicitrasaddaracanañhi pāvacanaṁ. Ayaṁ nayo aññesupi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n13:73: Yesaṁ samaṁ na passāmi, kevalaṁ mahi’maṁ cara’’nti
anya-e0803n13:74_0: Pāḷi. Ettha ‘‘purisānaṁ tiṁsasahassāni navuti ca satāni tiṁsa nāvutyo’’ti vuccanti.
anya-e0803n13:74_1: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne tiṁsasaddato sahassasaddassa navutisaddato ca satasaddassa lopaṁ
anya-e0803n13:74_2: katvā ‘‘tiṁsa nāvutyo’’ti vuttanti na gahetabbaṁ. Evañhi gahaṇe sati yattha katthacipi
anya-e0803n13:74_3: edisī saddaracanā kātabbā siyā, katāya ca edisāya saddaracanāya atthāvagamo vinā
anya-e0803n13:74_4: upadesena suṇantānaṁ na siyā, tasmā nevaṁ gahetabbaṁ. Evaṁ pana gahetabbaṁ – ‘‘tiṁsa
anya-e0803n13:74_5: nāvutyo’’ti idaṁ lokasaṅketarūḷhaṁ vacanaṁ, saṅketarūḷhassa pana vacanassattho yasmā
anya-e0803n13:74_6: gahitapubbasaṅketehi sutvā ñāyate, na upadesato, tasmā brahmadattena raññā vuttakālepi
anya-e0803n13:74_7: satthārā taṁ kathaṁ āharitvā vuttakālepi sabbe manussā vināpi upadesena vacanatthaṁ
anya-e0803n13:75: Tiṁsañceva sahassāni, navuti ca satāni tu;
anya-e0803n13:77: Yasmā pāvacane santi, nayā ceva acintiyā;
anya-e0803n13:80: Upadesaṁ sadā gaṇhe, garuṁ sammā upaṭṭhahaṁ.
anya-e0803n13:87: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
